object.property: Basic template that only collects sysUpTime.
Standard ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold
Template for 64-bit interface counters. Must use SNMP v2c for it to work.
Cisco template that collects cpu and free memory. Has CPU threshold at 90%
Net-SNMP template for late vintage unix device. Has CPU threshold.
Filesystem template that uses HOST-RESOURCES mib. Has a 90% threshold.
Windows template that requires Informant MIB
HardDisk I/O template that requries Informat MIB
Blank device template. No collection on port scanned devices.
ZenPlugin template for late vintage unix device. Has CPU threshold.
Ethernet interface template for ZenPlugins with 75% utilization threshold
APC Device Profile that tracks battery capacity, load and runtime
